:afterClose.description: Called when close animation is finished
:afterClose.description_zh: 关闭动画结束后触发的回调函数

:closable.description: Whether Alert can be closed, >=5.15.0: supports aria-*
:closable.description_zh: 可关闭配置，>=5.15.0: 支持 aria-*

:description.description_zh: 警告提示的辅助性文字介绍

:icon.description: Custom icon, effective when showIcon is true
:icon.description_zh: 自定义图标，showIcon 为 true 时有效

showIcon.default: false, in banner mode default is true

type.description: Type of Alert styles, options: success, info, warning, error
type.description_zh: 指定警告提示的样式，有四种选择 success、info、warning、error
type.default: info, in banner mode default is warning

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

events.name: onClose
events.description: A callback function that is triggered when closed
events.description_zh: 关闭时触发的回调函数
